msbt.message: You know what's kinda fun in a weird way? Goin' up against the time limit in the Fishing Tourney. I guess it just gets my competitive juices flowin'Hearin' that reel sizzle as I haul in another one at the last second
One thing you gotta remember about the Fishing Tourney is that it ain't free! So grab some Bells before you go talk to C.J., unless you wanna walk away disappointed.
You wanna know the secret to doin' well in the Fishing Tourney?You gotta chase every shadow! Toss that lure! There's no time for thinkin' or reflectin'!
Sure are a lotta folks out fishin' today OH! I forgot about the tourney! Ah, well. If some of us stay home and twiddle our thumbs, that gives the fish a fightin' chance, I suppose.
Great weather for fishin', eh?You sure you wanna stand around yakkin' with me instead of catchin' fish right now?
